from sys import stdin

def smallestUnwritableNumber(digits):
    smallest = 10 ** (digits[0] + 1)
    for digit in range(1, 10):
        candidate = int(str(digit) * (digits[digit] + 1))
        if candidate < smallest:
            smallest = candidate
    return smallest

testcases = int(stdin.readline());

for i in range(testcases):
    digits = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print smallestUnwritableNumber(digits)
